description:
Vulnerability **CVE-2022-30190** allows the Microsoft Support Diagnostics Utility to be abused via the **ms-msdt:** protocol to download malicious Word documents (or Excel spreadsheets) from the web or downloads with wget.
	
	This package removes the **ms-msdt:** protocol from the Windows Registry until Microsoft releases a hotfix for the CVE-2022-30190 vulnerability.

	Uninstalling the package restores the original state of the Windows Registry entry for **ms-msdt:**. If Microsoft itself has not restored the entry in a modified version with its hotfix.
	
	![Fast Startup](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/strausmann/ChocolateyPackages/manual/Microsoft/disable-ms-msdt/follina.png)
summary: Disables the ms-msdt protocol of Windows Devices (CVE-2022-30190)
author: Strausmann
